AUXILIARY_DESCRIPTIONS.undocumented aliens: individuals being smuggled, possibly hidden in a vehicle with fogged windows on a cold night, characterized by unwashed and unkempt appearance, suspected to be in vehicles stopped by Border Patrol agents near the United States-Mexican border, attempting to evade detection, exhibiting efforts to avoid detection by ducking and scrambling, admitted to being undocumented, including three women and five or six men found in a pickup truck camper, perceived as a social problem in controlling hordes from Mexico, unwashed and unkempt, scrambling when approached by Border Patrol agents, moving and slouching low to hide from flashlight beams, reacting to flashlight beams by ducking and scrambling, reacting to a bright light by physical movement in the interior of the pickup truck camper
